todos.title: Financials
todos.body: P&L, Balance Sheet, Cash Flow, Cap Table, The Deal.

todos.title: Product
todos.body: Functionality, features, architecture, intellectual property, development roadmap.

todos.title: Team
todos.body: Founders and management, board of directors, board of advisors.

todos.title: Solution
todos.body: Company's value proposition (how you make life better for customer), where product physically sits, provide use cases.

todos.title: Why Now
todos.body: What has led breakthrough, historical evolution, recent trends.

todos.title: Business Model
todos.body: Revenue model, pricing, average account size/lifetime value, sales and distribution models, customer pipeline.

todos.title: Problem
todos.body: Pain of customer, how the customer addresses the problem today.

todos.title: Market Size
todos.body: Identify profile customer, calculate TAM (top-down), SAM (bottoms up), and SOM.

todos.title: Company purpose
todos.body: Define the company in a single declarative sentence.
